description:
Welcome to zumba® in Brussels! 
Tuesday, Wednesday and Saturday join our dynamic classes by a group of professionals with many years experience in zumba, dancing, fitness and yoga, and lots of positive energy that we love to share with you :-) !

No previous experience needed, you can start when you like during the year, there are no inscription- or member fees.

PROGRAM FROM 2/9/2014:

- Tuesday 18h00 - 19h00 Zumba Fitness
-Wednesday 18h00 – 19h00 Zumba Fitness

Address: Le Cercle, Rue Doyen Boone 6, 1040 Bruxelles
It's best to register to these classes; it's a great venue but rather small.
Email to: [masked]

- Saturdays 2 classes at the same hour 12h00 - 13h00:
Room 1 = Zumba Fitness
Room 2 =Zumba®Kids (7–11 years)

If you have kids, bring them on Saturdays when we'll have 2 classes the same hour, for adults and kids. They'll have so much fun expressing themselves to their favourite songs! Especially perfect for single parents who cannot always find the occasion to attend sport classes. Kids whose parents don't zumba are of course also welcome, as well as adults who don't bring kids!

Start-up gift Saturday 6/9: invite a friend to zumba with you - come 2 pay for 1!

Address: Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB), Boulevard du Triomphe 8 "Access 8/Building L Sportcomplex", 1050 Bruxelles (Ixelles)

You don't need to register in advance, but to secure your place at class please email: [masked]

Zumba® dance fitness trend = 1 hour to burn your calories and renew your energy to the latest hit songs and Carribbean rhythms of salsa, merengue, bachata, reggaeton. It's lots of FUN !!

Welcome to zumba® in Brussels! 
Tuesday, Wednesday and Saturday join our dynamic classes by a group of professionals with many years experience in zumba, dancing, fitness and yoga, and lots of positive energy that we love to share with you :-) !

No previous experience needed, you can start when you like during the year, there are no inscription- or member fees.

PROGRAM FROM 2/9/2014:

- Tuesday 18h00 - 19h00 Zumba Fitness
-Wednesday 18h00 – 19h00 Zumba Fitness

Address: Le Cercle, Rue Doyen Boone 6, 1040 Bruxelles
It's best to register to these classes; it's a great venue but rather small.
Email to: [masked]

- Saturdays 2 classes at the same hour 12h00 - 13h00:
Room 1 = Zumba Fitness
Room 2 =Zumba®Kids (7–11 years)

If you have kids, bring them on Saturdays when we'll have 2 classes the same hour, for adults and kids. They'll have so much fun expressing themselves to their favourite songs! Especially perfect for single parents who cannot always find the occasion to attend sport classes. Kids whose parents don't zumba are of course also welcome.

Start-up gift Saturday 6/9: invite a friend to zumba with you - come 2 pay for 1!

Address: Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB), Boulevard du Triomphe 8 "Access 8/Building L Sportcomplex", 1050 Bruxelles (Ixelles)

You don't need to register in advance, but to secure your place at class please email: [masked]

Zumba® dance fitness trend = 1 hour to burn your calories and renew your energy to the latest hit songs and Carribbean rhythms of salsa, merengue, bachata, reggaeton. It's lots of FUN !!
